tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: You can find the Tenant ID in the Azure Portal. After signing in, click on 'Azure Active Directory' in the left-hand menu. The Tenant ID can be found in the 'Tenant information' section on the 'Azure Active Directory' overview page.

site_url.title: Site Url
site_url.description: Enter the URL of the SharePoint site you want to access. The site URL can be found in your browser's address bar when you visit the SharePoint site (e.g., https://your_domain.sharepoint.com/sites/your_site_name). Make sure to include the full URL, including the 'https://' prefix.
